msbt.message: <20_2 arg="10" />I just had an idea for working <20_2 arg="9" /> into my routine, .<20_3 arg="6" />Run laps around it!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Believe it or not, one of the biggest life lessons I ever got was about .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I learned I shouldn't lift everything that I see. I need to be polite and let some things be lifted by others.Changed my life, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Gotta be careful climbing into after a workout.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Don't wanna cramp up, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!This is awesome. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I can check on the big game during my jog!
<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Running is all about rhythm. <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /> helps me keep the beat, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />!Awesome for checking my heart rate, <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />and it tells pretty good time too!
? Out here?So is that, likenature trying to get back to nature, ?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know who put here, but they totally get it!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />NOTHING relaxes the muscles like a long soak after a run, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s really heavy. Whoever put it here must be super built!
<20_2 arg="10" />! Just what I needed after a thousand squats!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />?Why's that here? What if it rains?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />? Is this likean outdoor kitchen or something?
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Whoa! Perfect! Whoever put here knows how to get ripped!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Now this is what I'm talkin' about! Life on is meant to be lived outdoors, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yeah! Even just seeing here gets me pumped!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love how there's here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now I can check out my muscle tension even when it's dark out!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I just can't help doing a muscle pose or two whenever I go by here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's great being able to see how my muscles look at different times of day, !
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm so glad someone stuck here.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />After a really hard jog, sometimes I just wanna change clothes right away, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, check it out. I think that's .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I wonder how it feels about being in a little box out here. Maybe it's got a tiny gym set up in thereI guess I could live in a box like thatas long as I had enough room for , .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Check out this little guy swimming laps in there. I'm pretty sure it's .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Must be nice to have a lane all to itselfno bumping fins in a crowded stream for this guy!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh, , this is what I love about island lifestumbling across a cool fossil just out on display. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />So what would we call this? A free- range ?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Uh, I'm not really an expert, but should this be outside? It's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I need this space for , . I don't want to worry about knocking this thing over!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, do you think I could dead-lift ?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Whoa! How convenient that there's one right here. <10_4 />UmI already maxed out today. I'll try some other time.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Huhthere's something that just feels off about this art<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's like when you do pull-ups, but you're swingin' your legs all over the place to do 'em. Just kindafake.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I don't know who put this here, but I owe them big-time. Gotta love !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm definitely stopping by for my next post-run cooldown. You, uh, might wanna stay upwind

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, I can't stop staring at your .<20_3 arg="3" /><20_3 arg="6" />But my eyes are getting so TIRED. That tells me I gotta work on my staring muscles. Ready?<10_4 /> HRRRGH!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Hey, who's the good-looking fella? Waitchiseled musclesimpeccable postureconfident eyes <20_3 arg="3" />That's ME! Aww, I'm glad to see someone gave my portrait a nice place to flex, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />, look what someone left just sitting out here. It's !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Aww, I'm getting nostalgic. When I was a kid, I could play around with something like this instead of lifting.Don't get me wrong—I'd also do chin-ups on the monkey bars!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, I could really lose a whole entire day playing with <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Ugh, but then I'd miss my fusion and power workout, .

Aha! Look what we have here. !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now the great will attempt a world-leading height in the random-object high jumpOh, FINE. What's the use in having an elite vertical leap if you never get to use it?

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh! How thoughtful of someone to leave something heavy like here!<20_3 arg="3" />Now I don't even have to go to the gym to do curls. I can just use !<20_3 arg="6" />Don't worry, I'm not gonna break anything. I'd have to do reps before I got that tired.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nothing's better than jogging by .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Getting a quick heat boost on a good sweat? Can't beat it, !
